name: peacock

a large bird, the male of which has very long tail feathers that it can spread out to show bright colours and patterns shaped like eyes

old-fashioned disapproving a man is who is very proud of his appearance and gives a lot of attention to his clothes and the way he dresses

Modern & fashionable
(of a man) to behave in a way that shows that he is very proud of his appearance, for example by wearing clothes that make people notice him: Nowadays we're used to football officials peacocking around in every conceivable colour, but back then people were utterly shocked. "I think the light behind me could give a nice silhouette", says the boxer, peacocking down the alley towards the camera.
